DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim study develop method oocyte cryopreservation evaluate impact reproductive outcome .
DOC.criteria: Any consent female wish freeze unfertilized oocyte : 1. risk ovarian hyperstimulation syndrome ( enlarged ovary abdominal fluid accumulation ) postponement pregnancy recommend . 2. cancer patient anticipate treatment clear oncologist ovarian stimulation . 3. female seek preserve future fertility wish use donor partner sperm fertilize egg . 4. donor egg recipient elect egg obtain fertilized husband/partner sperm rest cryopreserved future use . 5. patient partner 's sperm retrieval production fail donor sperm option . 6. patient , religious ethical reason , want limit number fresh oocyte expose sperm ( fertilization ) want either discard donate excess oocyte . AND 1. clinically psychologically approve ovarian stimulation 2. age 12 42 year , inclusive , time informed consent . 3. willing able comply protocol . 4. willing provide followup information OB/GYN CVS/amniocentesis result , well information obstetrical outcome . 5. agree undergo intracytoplasmic sperm injection ( ICSI ) oocytes thaw . For cancer patient : 1 . No significant ovarian pathology judge physical exam radiological study ; 2 . Patient 's general condition prognosis deem favorable surgery chemo/radio therapy ; 3 . No major medical illness , 4 . Oncologist approval ovarian stimulation egg retrieval . Age > 42 Subjects meet inclusion criterion ineligible participation study .
